name: Yet Another Corona Tracker
main_text: Yet Another Corona Tracker(YACT), as the name suggests, is yet another Corona tracker!! The Tracker keeps record of the data of the total cases in India state-wise, on a day-to-day basis. Besides it also keeps track of the worldwide Covid-19 cases country-wise. We have also put out a Global Map to show this numbers easily. But we also want to help in our small way, so we have provided a list of all the Medical Test Centers for Covid-19 in India, as well as a list of fundraisers for the disease.

sources.name: Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) Cases, provided by JHU CSSE
